entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Saint-Quentin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:25 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 29 this morning. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 19.
